#include<stdio.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int a[100001],t,i,n;
	a[0]=1;
	for(i=1;i<100001;i++)
	a[i]=(a[i-1]*2)%mod;
	i=0;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		i++;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n==1)
		printf("Case %lld: 1\n",i);
		else
		{
			printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",i,(a[n-2]*(n+1))%mod);
		}
	}
}
